verses.verse: Likewise <S%G3668><s%>, ye wives <S%G1135><s%>, be in subjection <S%G5293><s%> <S%G5746><s%> to your own <S%G2398><s%> husbands <S%G435><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%>, if any <S%G1536><s%> obey not <S%G544><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%>, they <S%G2770><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may <S%G2770><s%> without <S%G427><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> be won <S%G2770><s%> <S%G5686><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the conversation <S%G391><s%> of the wives <S%G1135><s%>;
While they behold <S%G2029><s%> <S%G5660><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> chaste <S%G53><s%> conversation <S%G391><s%> coupled with <S%G1722><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%>.

Whose <S%G3739><s%> adorning <S%G2889><s%> let it <S%G2077><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G2077><s%> <S%G5749><s%> that outward <S%G1855><s%> adorning of plaiting <S%G1708><s%> the hair <S%G2359><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of wearing <S%G4025><s%> of gold <S%G5553><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> of putting on <S%G1745><s%> of apparel <S%G2440><s%>;

But <S%G235><s%> let it be the hidden <S%G2927><s%> man <S%G444><s%> of the heart <S%G2588><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> that which is not corruptible <S%G862><s%>, even the ornament of a meek <S%G4239><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> quiet <S%G2272><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> of great price <S%G4185><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> after this manner <S%G3779><s%> in the old time <S%G4218><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> trusted <S%G1679><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, adorned <S%G2885><s%> <S%G5707><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%>, being in subjection <S%G5293><s%> <S%G5746><s%> unto their own <S%G2398><s%> husbands <S%G435><s%>:

Havahn as <S%G5613><s%> Sara <S%G4564><s%> obeyed <S%G5219><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Avraham <S%G11><s%>, calling <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5723><s%> him <S%G846><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%>: whose <S%G3739><s%> daughters <S%G5043><s%> ye are <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5675><s%>, as long as ye do well <S%G15><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> are <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> afraid <S%G5399><s%> <S%G5740><s%> with any <S%G3367><s%> amazement <S%G4423><s%>.

Likewise <S%G3668><s%>, ye husbands <S%G435><s%>, dwell with <S%G4924><s%> <S%G5723><s%> them according to <S%G2596><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%>, giving <S%G632><s%> <S%G5723><s%> honour <S%G5092><s%> unto the wife <S%G1134><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> unto the weaker <S%G772><s%> vessel <S%G4632><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> being heirs together <S%G4789><s%> of the grace <S%G5485><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>; that <S%G1519><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> prayers <S%G4335><s%> be <S%G1581><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> hindered <S%G1581><s%> <S%G5745><s%>.

Finally <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5056><s%>, be ye all <S%G3956><s%> of one mind <S%G3675><s%>, having compassion one of another <S%G4835><s%>, love as brethren <S%G5361><s%>, be pitiful <S%G2155><s%>, be courteous <S%G5391><s%>:

Not <S%G3361><s%> rendering <S%G591><s%> <S%G5723><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> for <S%G473><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> railing <S%G3059><s%> for <S%G473><s%> railing <S%G3059><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> contrariwise <S%G5121><s%> b'rakhah <S%G2129><s%>; knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5761><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye are <S%G2564><s%> thereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye should inherit <S%G2816><s%> <S%G5661><s%> a b'rakhah <S%G2127><s%> <S%G5723><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he that will <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5723><s%> love <S%G25><s%> <S%G5721><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5629><s%> good <S%G18><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>, let him refrain <S%G3973><s%> <S%G5657><s%> his <S%G846><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> from <S%G575><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> lips <S%G5491><s%> that they speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5658><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> guile <S%G1388><s%>:

For <S%G3754><s%> the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%> are over <S%G1909><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> are open unto <S%G1519><s%> their <S%G846><s%> prayers <S%G1162><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%> is against <S%G1909><s%> them that do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5723><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is he that will harm <S%G2559><s%> <S%G5694><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> ye be <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5638><s%> followers <S%G3402><s%> of that which is good <S%G18><s%>?

But <S%G235><s%> and if <S%G1499><s%> ye suffer <S%G3958><s%> <S%G5722><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> righteousness' sake <S%G1343><s%>, happy <S%G3107><s%> are ye: and <S%G1161><s%> be <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> afraid <S%G5399><s%> <S%G5676><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> terror <S%G5401><s%>, neither <S%G3366><s%> be troubled <S%G5015><s%> <S%G5686><s%>;

But <S%G1161><s%> sanctify <S%G37><s%> <S%G5657><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> be ready <S%G2092><s%> always <S%G104><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> give an answer <S%G627><s%> to every man <S%G3956><s%> that asketh <S%G154><s%> <S%G5723><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> a reason <S%G3056><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> that is in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> meekness <S%G4240><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%>:

Having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> a good <S%G18><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%>, whereas <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> they speak evil <S%G2635><s%> <S%G5725><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> of evildoers <S%G2555><s%>, they may be ashamed <S%G2617><s%> <S%G5686><s%> that falsely accuse <S%G1908><s%> <S%G5723><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> good <S%G18><s%> conversation <S%G391><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is better <S%G2909><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> be so <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, that ye suffer <S%G3958><s%> <S%G5721><s%> for well doing <S%G15><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, than <S%G2228><s%> for evil doing <S%G2554><s%> <S%G5723><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> hath once <S%G530><s%> suffered <S%G3958><s%> <S%G5627><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>, the just <S%G1342><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the unjust <S%G94><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he might bring <S%G4317><s%> <S%G5632><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, being put to death <S%G2289><s%> <S%G5772><s%> <S%G3303><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> quickened <S%G2227><s%> <S%G5685><s%> by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>:

By <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he went <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5679><s%> and preached <S%G2784><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto the spirits <S%G4151><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>;

Which sometime <S%G4218><s%> were dis`Ovedient <S%G544><s%> <S%G5660><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> once <S%G530><s%> the longsuffering <S%G3115><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> waited <S%G1551><s%> <S%G5711><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of Noach <S%G3575><s%>, while the ark <S%G2787><s%> was a preparing <S%G2680><s%> <S%G5746><s%>, wherein <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> few <S%G3641><s%>, that is <S%G5123><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, eight <S%G3638><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%> were saved <S%G1295><s%> <S%G5681><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> water <S%G5204><s%>.

The like figure <S%G499><s%> whereunto <S%G3739><s%> even immersion <S%G908><s%> doth <S%G4982><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5719><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> (not <S%G3756><s%> the putting away <S%G595><s%> of the filth <S%G4509><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> the answer <S%G1906><s%> of a good <S%G18><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>,) by <S%G1223><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>:

Who <S%G3739><s%> is gone <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5679><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>; angels <S%G32><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> authorities <S%G1849><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> powers <S%G1411><s%> being made subject <S%G5293><s%> <S%G5651><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>.
